subject: Submission of documents with RFQ Application- Clarification- Corrigendum-reg.
text: 9Tr <cfly KTH gfearur TM14 Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a MT67, 73v 4dr7T 3 Troa T7Ta) '#7A Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India WA. Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) j1-5 & 6, Tir-10, E1aT;, 7 @rr-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/218/2007-Admn: 261h April 2010 Corrigendum to CIRCULAR No. 54/2010 Technical (Decision taken on file No. NHAI/Tech/NH 69/Betul/2009) Sub: Submission of documents with RFQ Application Clarification Corrigendum reg: It was   clarified vide above cited Circular No. 54/2010, that the vital documents like Power of Attorney (PoA)  Experience Certificates, Joint Bidding Agreement (JBA) submitted with the application in original would only be considered while evaluating the applications. 2 In this regard, it is further clarified that the copy of the JBA if submitted with the application be considered while evaluating the applications, as the same is permitted in the RFQ vide clause 2.13.2 (iv). 3 Further, in line with the accepted practice & norms followed with respect to submission of documents in the country, it is also clarified that  certified (bearing the certified true copy stamp alongwith proper signature & stamp of the signatoryl /attested copies (attested by & Notary Public) of the experience certificates may also be considered while evaluating the applications. 4 This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI. (Gautam Das) General Manager (Coord)-I To: 1_ PS to Chairman 2. PS to All Members 3. PS to All CGMs/CVO 4 AlI GMs/DGMs/Managers 5 AII ROs/PIUs/CMUs/SPVs 6 Librarian/Hindi Officer 4T 71 T1 NHAL
